channel.title: Glitch/bug Montage
channel.description:
I have a load more, can't seem to find them.. I'm assuming they're on my other pc, I'll have to post them later. These are just some I've done recently. These really aren't the best glitches, then again I'm not the best bugger.
[img]http://i96.photobucket.com/albums/l190/bloodrayne93/buggies/smuggledstuff-1.png[/img] Smuggled circus items
[img]http://i96.photobucket.com/albums/l190/bloodrayne93/buggies/lampprayer.png[/img] All prayers activated
[img]http://i96.photobucket.com/albums/l190/bloodrayne93/imwalkinonlavaacensor.png[/img] Simple graphical bug
[img]http://i96.photobucket.com/albums/l190/bloodrayne93/sled21-1.png[/img] My favorite, sled anywhere
[img]http://i96.photobucket.com/albums/l190/bloodrayne93/sled2censor.png[/img] Same
[img]http://i96.photobucket.com/albums/l190/bloodrayne93/slednoclip342.png[/img] The effects of using agility shortcuts is different while riding a sled
[img]http://i96.photobucket.com/albums/l190/bloodrayne93/slednoclipcensor.png[/img] Again
[img]http://i96.photobucket.com/albums/l190/bloodrayne93/sled21.png[/img] Againx2
[img]http://i96.photobucket.com/albums/l190/bloodrayne93/lolunedit.png[/img] Filter abuse ;P
[img]http://i96.photobucket.com/albums/l190/bloodrayne93/boatglitch-1.png[/img] Jagex stupidity
[img]http://i96.photobucket.com/albums/l190/bloodrayne93/invisibilitt.png[/img] Simple invisibility :]
[img]http://i96.photobucket.com/albums/l190/bloodrayne93/2ndlevelnoclip.png[/img] Yeah.
I'm not sure if I'm allowed to post these >.< I don't see why not, so meh ;D
And yeah, they're all mine, my name is Taylor and I am a member on Ezud.
[b]POST YOUR STUFF HERE TOOOO NAOO[/b]
